html:
3.30.21  9:06 am   The bright red background of the lyrics page is physically painful to stare at. Consider changing it for a better lyrics-viewing experience?

      consider LISTENING to the song for the recommended lyric expecience

3.30.21  8:22 am   what's up with that part of your last song at 1:42? it makes me so emotional and i want to cry whenever it plays

      just trying to get the job done

3.30.21  3:59 am   how do you deal with losing perspective when you're making/mixing music? like when you've been working for 6 hours straight and you can no longer tell if anything you've done is good or not

      it seems like you'll have to find a way to complete the whole thing in less than 2 hours

3.30.21  3:52 am   Why did you choose the style of music that you use?

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

3.30.21  2:03 am   do you think sadness or suffering are a good motivation to get things done,

     sometimes

     or does it have to come from love or joy?

     that could be more pleasant..... if it works

3.29.21  10:48 pm   what makes music sound good?

      you

3.29.21  10:25 pm   where is comic sans?

      on a sign for pet grooming, for example

3.29.21  8:44 pm   getting really frustrated about how many different ways there are to play the same chord. Any tips?

      have you tried doing it in songs

3.29.21  8:13 pm   how do i get over the soul-crushing feeling that i'll never accomplish my dreams?

      maybe accomplish just 1

3.29.21  7:55 pm   I can't find the question I asked you not too long ago. Do you know what it was?

      was it this one

3.29.21  7:54 pm   do your videos have meaning

      yes

3.29.21  7:23 pm   whats the difference between Badd9 and B/C#

      Badd9 has B in the bass. B/C# has C# in the bass

3.29.21  6:28 pm   What would you recommend doing education wise for starting a music career. Drop out of school, stay but practice a lot...

      try to listen to every song in the world. also, start developing a very friendly relationship with your favorite instruments

3.29.21  6:05 pm   What is humanity

      could be you

3.29.21  5:05 pm   Any context about why you make some of your songs?

      songs are an extremely powerful and potent form of expression. i want in

3.29.21  4:59 pm   have you tried eating oranges in the shower

      no

3.29.21  4:54 pm   how to stop being overwhelmed by passion

      try writing down the passion

3.29.21  3:35 pm   I've noticed your songs often end somewhat abruptly, such as the "i'm a dunce" bit at the end of "i'm a princess". I enjoy how you do it that way, though I don't exactly know why I do, and I was wondering if you have reasons that you enjoy doing it that way.

      i just follow the the golden rule, which is to try to make the best song i can

3.29.21  3:32 pm   How to make a ballad

      that's easy, just make rock and roll and then turn up the volume even more

3.29.21  1:11 pm   how to be cool?

      first you'll wanna go ahead and take an envelope and put it inside another envelope

3.29.21  1:05 pm   What do you think about recording songs in audacity?

      that could work

3.29.21  12:46 pm   why are your songs so catchy 

      so that hopefully they might *influence* you

3.29.21  12:42 pm   holy shit! the bridge section in "it's gonna be alright" - how did you come up with that, bill, just how?!

      it helped to listen to thousands of songs and also try to write hundreds of them, first

3.29.21  12:15 pm   Is music a type of glue?)

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.29.21  11:51 am   ok, so: if you had the chance to end the world, would you take it?

     no

     and which planet would you send everyone to, or would you just kill everyone?

also i love your songs i can't get them out of my head :)

3.29.21  10:45 am   Whats your favorite song you made

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.29.21  10:15 am   What is it like making music videos on youtube?

      i've never done that. i always make the video first offline, so i can edit

3.29.21  9:37 am   how can one be more confident in oneself?

      you know the game "tag", ... (the one where you tag someone and say "tag, you're it" and then that person's it.) Well, tag, you're it

3.29.21  9:12 am   do you find it hard to consider a song "done",

     yes

     if yes why

     for example, if it sucks

3.29.21  9:04 am   Did you ever think of putting your music on radio?

      yes i'm going to go ahead and do that

3.29.21  8:39 am   What's your opinion on architecture

      dank

3.29.21  8:00 am   as a musician, whats the hardest thing to do

      figure out exactly what is good

3.29.21  7:32 am   why is the earth flat

      so it's easier to make maps

3.29.21  7:04 am   what is something you wish more people understood?

      time and space

3.29.21  5:58 am   what do you think about light and shadow 

      sometimes you think shadow is light, until you see light

3.29.21  5:20 am   are you still riding a pony into the sunset until now?

      i can keep trying

3.29.21  4:30 am   it it true that the video for I'm princess took 3 years to make

      no

3.29.21  3:09 am   why did you decide to make your 2 latest music videos in 3d?

      probably life influencing art

3.29.21  1:35 am   People keep asking me what I want to do after high school, which is a scary question. The real answer is that I want to graduate and then go into hiding for a while, but how do I say that in a way that is proper and respectable and sounds like I know what I'm doing?

      you could get one of those pocket squares

3.29.21  1:31 am   You're super funny - what are your tips on comedy?

      sometimes a very scientific/factual approach works best

3.29.21  1:12 am   when making a song, i can have a few isolated parts but have no idea how to put them together in a way that makes sense, how do you go about this situation?

      i've almost never seen that work. if you have 2 separate parts that are not together, sticking them together usually doesn't seem to work, at least not for me. i find it's much better to just play through one of them, and then try to imagine what goes next. and don't worry about the other part that was never connected. You can do the same thing with that part. 2 songs

3.29.21  1:02 am   why has the age-old helvetica been abandoned for the arguably inferior arial font

      i actually can't tell the difference

3.28.21  11:11 pm   how do i know if i'm a princess?

      you should get a tingling sensation

3.28.21  10:59 pm   why do you wear your watch on your left hand 

      why wouldn't i

3.28.21  10:55 pm   What exactly is cheese?

      it's kind of like really good bread

3.28.21  10:37 pm   which one of your videos was your favourite to make?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

3.28.21  10:22 pm   so what is your opinion on penguins? just checking

      they have knees, that's all i know. sometimes my mind just runs wild with wondering the exact number of knees they could have

3.28.21  9:38 pm   is it possible to produce a song too much?

      yes

3.28.21  9:14 pm   Do you annoy your neighbours when singing 

      no

3.28.21  8:38 pm   Where would you want to go on vacation? 

      around the world
